name: Penfold
slogan: Digital / challenger pension. We get young people saving enough for later life

jobs.title: Senior Frontend Software Engineer
jobs.description:
The Role

We’re looking for an experienced software engineer with a focus on front-end technologies to join our team in London. Here are some of the things you’ll help us with:

*  Building features on our website that engage customers and bring to life an asset that has a meaningful impact on people’s lives.
*  Improving the maturity of our technical stack with engineering best practices
*  Collaborating with members of the product and design teams to continually refine and improve our product in an agile process.
*  Being part of the code review process and helping to mentor other engineers.
*  Working together with the CTO to shape Penfold’s engineering roadmap and culture

You

*  Have extensive experience with front-end technologies (e.g. Javascript, ReactJS, Node.js)
*  Are familiar with the principles of responsive design and can produce CSS/HTML that renders on a range of devices
*  Understand how to interact and integrate with backend APIs, GraphQL in particular.
*  Are comfortable developing on UNIX-like systems (e.g. macOS or Linux)
*  Relish the idea of working in a small team in a fast-paced startup environment
*  Enjoy working in an agile, collaborative process alongside members of other teams.
* Are excited by the opportunity to grow into a leadership role as the company expands.
jobs.descriptionHtml:
The Role

We’re looking for an experienced software engineer with a focus on front-end technologies to join our team in London. Here are some of the things you’ll help us with:

  • Building features on our website that engage customers and bring to life an asset that has a meaningful impact on people’s lives.
  • Improving the maturity of our technical stack with engineering best practices
  • Collaborating with members of the product and design teams to continually refine and improve our product in an agile process.
  • Being part of the code review process and helping to mentor other engineers.
  • Working together with the CTO to shape Penfold’s engineering roadmap and culture

You

  • Have extensive experience with front-end technologies (e.g. Javascript, ReactJS, Node.js)
  • Are familiar with the principles of responsive design and can produce CSS/HTML that renders on a range of devices
  • Understand how to interact and integrate with backend APIs, GraphQL in particular.
  • Are comfortable developing on UNIX-like systems (e.g. macOS or Linux)
  • Relish the idea of working in a small team in a fast-paced startup environment
  • Enjoy working in an agile, collaborative process alongside members of other teams.
  • Are excited by the opportunity to grow into a leadership role as the company expands.
